name: Amity's Samhain
description:
Indie game inspired by Wolfenstein 3D.

On October 1st 2021 I decided to make a simple game for Halloween to learn how to use SDL, so I choose to do a raycasting-shooter game like Wolfenstein 3D! In this moment the game is more like a demo, but in my free time I'll continue to work on it

Every suggestion or commentary is welcome!
